TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void BookmarkCallback(NativeActivityContext context, Bookmark bookmark, object value);
.class public auto ansi sealed BookmarkCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The execution environment of the activity handling the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark"> resumption.
The data associated with the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark"> resumption.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that is called when a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark"> is resumed.
